body_html: @essamgoda that sounds like cuda isn't installed quite right. Try doing what it says, otherwise searching for methods of reinstalling nvidia drivers (sometimes you have to work pretty hard to remove remaining parts of cuda if you have used a mix of manual and automatic methods).
